title: WTB T210 Series 3 Ft Worth players
author: bnorth

posts.post_title: WTB T210 Series 3 Ft Worth players
posts.post_content:
Looking for raw or SGC graded lower end cards of Coyle, Francis, Jolley, McKay, Morris, Pendelton, Salazor, and Weeks. Trimmed and hole punched cards are OK also.

I also have several raw and SGC graded T210's to trade.
Anybody? Would love to add at least a couple to my collection. You know the old saying "I have $ burning a hole in my pocket" Please don't make me spend it on 55 Bowmans to finish that set.:D
